comments: I took it in summer, and let me tell you something.. her class is SO EASY, we had 1 group speech which 5 ppl had to present a 30 sec part, and one alone speech about 5-8 mins. It is so EASY, she makes it a RELAXED enviroment because everyone is nervous. If you need speech, take it WITH HER.. SHE IS SO EASY & HELPFUL!
